content.detailedDescription:
I was at my garden with my sis and my friend talking about ufo's and that styf, than a strange light apeared on the sky, like a golf ball but too far of us, going in direction to north, mountain of sintra. than another one comes from there, they crossed and the second one comed to soul like nowone was there to stop it.... 

everywone went crazy about that, was a new experience but that's not all, we saw it goes in direction to the horizont than disapeared on the lane, was not an aircraft becose the lights were nos pincling and becose the colision of tha 2 of them...
content.summary: Was like 5am and an object started to cross the sky above me, than another apeared, 1st in direction to north and 2nd directed to soul

content.detailedDescription:
While observing the stars, in what seems to be a reoccurring event, i have been noticing multiple "stacked" star like formations in the sky above anahola.  tonight, while observing the familiar clusters, i had noticed an object moving very fast in the sky which then stopped and flashed a very bright light.  soon after the flash, the object continued on towards the ne sky of kauai, only to stop and flash again disappearing into the horizon.  this event went on 5-6 times, each time turning slightly after it had stopped! the 3rd time, my wife had witnessed the events and soon after, my granddaughter and son-in-law had also witnessed the events. 
i was again astonished by the speed, the shape and flash of the light, as well as the change of direction which could not be matched by mankind at this time.  i believe firmly now that we are not alone.
content.summary: While observing multiple

content.detailedDescription:
My mother, 15 year old brother and his friend, stepped outside onto the porch of their home in fountain lake, arkansas.  i happen to look up and was shocked to see what seemed to me like something right out of a science fiction movie:  right above us there was a slow-moving, gigantic, triangular black mass just slowly passing approx. sw towards hot springs, which is perhaps a mile from the home.  it wasn't too late in the evening, maybe 23:00, 24:00, and it was approx in early november.  there was no noise at all--not even from nature or local noise, save the television.  there was no electrical disruption.  none of us recall there having been lights, which is the first thing i tried to find on the object.  i expected to see tell-tale signs of more human origin, but it was surreal--no lights.  i remember wanting it to be fake deep down inside, but the thing is, it wasn't scary at all.  just surreal.  we all felt like something wasn't right, like reality stopped existing for a moment, but we were still very real.

i've subsequently, in the last several years, seen movies that have mimicked the precise, matter-of-fact nature of seeing what we saw--movies that just showed in a "verite-home video-style" a "craft" that just appeared on screen.  what i saw that night felt like that:  the spaceship just coming into the scene, and then going out of frame--that blunt.

prior to this, i had seen a very distant, smaller version of the same thing, not but a very few days before.  that felt peculiar affect-wise, but this larger, up-close experience was both profound and unsettling.  since then i have never seen anything else.  subsequently, i also have developed a deep fear of "alien" phenomenon.  i hardly will ever watch anything about "realistic" gray-type aliens.  i can handle thor on stargate sg-1, but when hollywood tries to get super real, i have to turn the movie off!

i've never seen the silly lights in the sky thing.  this was far more real and profound.  i argue with anybody that stuff like this isn't real--somehow, some way.
content.summary: Gigantic triangular black mass just floating towards hot springs.  the object seemed very near the ground.  no sound or lights recalled.

content.detailedDescription: For 90 minutes observed 7 white ufo objects with binoculars gradually appear in the distance overhead and far apart . objects never formed a specific shape rather constantly changed. looked fluid and string like. continuously shape shifting. watched from my yard.First looked like round stars witthout binoculars
content.summary: Looked directly up over my home saw starlike object but with binoculars saw fast moving squiggly objects

content.detailedDescription: On approximately the evening of july 27th, 8:30 pm, i stepped outside to our front yard to have a cigarette while speaking on the phone with my friend. i was looking up at the sky when i thought i saw the lights of a plane going overhead towards sept-îles. i then caught sight of multiple plane lights and thought it was strange that they were so close to each other and so many. that was when i realized they were all connected to each other and that it was one big craft that was blocking out all the stars when it passed. it looked like an impossibly enormous triangle. it was blacker than black. it made no sound. at that point i blurted out,"a huge ufo!" to my friend on the phone and dashed towards the house. i opened the door and screamed for my husband to come. when i returned to the drive way i continued to watch it pass and go towards sept-îles silently until i could no longer see the lights. my husband came out too late to see it. my friend will have the exact time and date of that phone call to discern the exact time and date of this incident. for the next two days, following that night, there was an unusual amount of helicopters flying in circles over our block. it's normal to see one or two in a day but there was more than five and they came all together and stayed around our block for over 30 minutes. my husband works in emergency services and thought the presence of so many helicopters meant there was some kind of disaster. he grabbed his radio and was preparing to get a call. no call came.
content.summary: The craft looked exactly like the  illustration of the object seen while driving in burlington, ontario, canada, about 9:40 p.M. on august 10, 2014 in case 58833.

content.detailedDescription:
Didnt see it...  

i was at home....  i remember pouring a bowl of cereal b4 bedtime (apparently i never ate the cereal...Its still on the table near the back patio about 1/2 gone)

i have bruising (where blood was taken from rt arm -triangle set of 3 puncture marks in crook of arm w/bruising- and what looks like finger type bruises along my wrist....  also a bruised and very sore knee -left-   i awoke with lower 1/2 of my rt. arm partially numb extending to middle, ring and pinky fingers of rt hand).

i didnt have a fall and cannot remember ever falling asleep that night and when i awoke it felt as if i had been up all night long...  with a terrible headache for the entire day at work...
content.summary: Didnt see it...  have bruising

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend decided to go out to millenium park in dorval, qc. it's a nice park with a open area where you can sit and star gaze. my girlfriend placed the bed sheets and blanket that she brought with her right in the middle of the park. the moon was very bright and the sky was semi-polluted where you can still see the stars, but the sky wasn't pitch black.

about 20 minutes of star gazing, my girlfriend pointed towards the south and said "hey look, what is that?". i quickly looked where she was pointing only to see a very distinctive circular object. the ufo had a grey base which matched the color of the polluted sky, but it also had a "flaming" orange color on the outer edges all around. what was particularly strange about this ufo is that it was gliding, made no sound, and would change speeds. the ufo was slow from the beginning, but started to gain burst of speeds every second. it wasn't a constant speed which was strange.

there were plenty of planes flying around with big flashy lights and going at the same speed. the object we witnessed was going slower than the planes we were looking, but has a very distinctive oval shape, and had an orange/flaming ring on the outside which definitely distinguished itself from any plane we saw. the ufo eventually glided out of site and that was the last we saw of it.
content.summary: Gliding ufo in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Was @ work on a very cloudy day.There was a round break in the clouds that appeared out of place.I started recording the site since it looked weird to me,also i felt uneasy as if being watched.When i replayed the video i notice a ufo darting across sky into the opening in the clouds .It dissapeared behind the clouds.What led me divulge this info is that when i try to send it to my home p.C.It always reads video deleted.Im thinking big bro doesnt want this view.Which is pissing me off.I can send via text to other phone only.
content.summary: Dense cloud cover.With round clearing.Strange vibe so started recording witnessed something dark  acending fast making swoosh sound

content.detailedDescription: I walked out onto my patio to have a cigarette, just as i stepped out onto the patio i saw a bright white flash of light in the sky to the east if me and thought i had seen a shooting star, however as i caught the tail end of the flash a bright white star like object seemed to be at the end and still in the sky.  it was clearly very far away but it was sitting just above the line of my neighbours tree.  i thought this was odd so i kept watching it.  visibility was clear, no clouds that could be making it pulsating or flashing the way it was.  it appeared to be moving slightly as i was measuring its movement in regards to the tree.  every so often it would dart quickly and move position so it would either be to the left or the right of the tree.  when it darted into a new position there was a very quick streak of light that would be left behind that quickly disappeared.  whilst i was noticing this particular object another to the right of it was moving in a similar way, sometimes closer to the other object and sometimes further away, or sometimes higher than the other object and sometimes lower, this one too had the same light streak whenever it moved very quickly into a new position.  the light on the right then began to ascend and move further east whereas the other light was staying put although every son often still moving position, but getting higher in the sky.  i then to the south of me caught glimpse of an airplane heading eastwards because the night is so clear dye to the enlarged full moon and no clouds i could easily make out it was an airplane.  it was flying much lower than the two bright white lights, it was moving at a steady but slow pace and there was an orange emergency light flashing.  i watched these two white lights for 30 mins but they hadn't gone away by the time i came in here to report it.  it is worth mentioning that the light on the right appeared to be heading further east as the light was getting dimmer, but then came back come down lower again and becoming brighter in line with the other bright white light.  i am sorry if this seems a bit garbled.  never done or seen anything like thus before but felt it was worth reporting.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 bright white lights moving around in sky leaving white streaks in sky

content.detailedDescription:
My wife took a picture of the clouds. then we came in the house and she  
 showed me the pictures, she never saw the orb in the shot. i told her what is that blue dot, she replied she never saw it. she took 3 pictures in a row. only the first picture had the orb in it.  we don't know what it was, or why it appeared only in the #1 shot.
content.summary: {cak}   my wife took a picture

content.detailedDescription: I went outside for a ciggeret when i noticed a brilliant bright light moving across the sky silently. suddenly 2 objects left the main object. primary object changed direction and speed to avoid an aircraft heading towards birmingham international airport. it moved into cloud and never reappeared. 1of the 2 smaller objects followed the same path and again moved into cloud and never came out. the last object i saw was travelling north and again moved behind cloud and never came out.
content.summary: 1st object seen moving east. 2 objest ejected. 1st of the 2 followed primary craft the 2nd flew north

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south on boundary road.
saw orb hovering very low to my left.
thought it might be bird or lamp.
kept looking to see if what i was seeing was truly there.
sure enough it was.
drove past it and rerouted back to see if i could see it.
took the same route to see if it could be something simply explained.
nothing.  ufo.
silver orb, small. had texture and center band around the middle

my reaction was 'what the hell is that?' literally.
content.summary: Driving south on boundary road nearing 22nd avenue intersection when i saw a silver textured orb hovering east.

content.detailedDescription:
While flying from san jose to mather airport i noticed a reflective sphere out of my window. at first i thought it might be the moon, but it appeared to be metallic. it stayed in the one position as the plane turned to the east. approximately 30 seconds after i first saw it, i pulled out my iphone 5 to take some pictures. unfortunately the camera function had no zoom feature and the image is quite small. i snapped a second picture as the plane turned east and the object could no longer be seen through my window.

there were several fires around the area at the time and there was some high level smoke mixed with the clouds. after approximately 15 minutes as the plane started to head north and tipped right wing up, i could see the moon out of the opposite windows. it was quite large and had a yellow/orange cast to it. it appeared much larger in the window frame as well. this would place the moon to the south west while what i had seen earlier was to the north west.

the object i observed definitely appeared stationary and had a reflective silver metallic surface low on the horizon while the moon was larger and to the east at that time, glowing more yellow/orange.
content.summary: Solid sphere, silver/white reflective stationary

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside my place outside at around 4am and nothing but stars were in the sky.  it was very clear with no clouds or air crafts. a big bright ball of light caught my eye so i looked up and seen it had a hazy bright ring around it and a trail. i didn't see any color other than bright white. it started from high ne of the sky then went in a line sw until i lost it due to roof tops. it was a steady speed not to fast but fast enough to see a light trail.
content.summary: Big bright ball of light with a bright hazy ring around it amid a trail of light.

content.detailedDescription: I received an email from someone in town stating there was a weird light in the sky which would hover and then dart from side to side.  i jumped in my vehicle and went to the area that the email described.  when i arrived there i was shocked to see a diamond shaped bright light which would change colours (from blue to green, white and red) almost like a consistent fusion of all these colours...No flashing.  it was hovering over powerlines at the local town electrical station.  ever since then ive been back a few times and have seen them.  what troubles me is that when i try to get close enough to take a picture they dart out with magnificent speed and disappear.  its borderline disturbing but amazing nonetheless.
content.summary: I see them repeatedly (between 1 and 3) hovering over or near the local powerline electrical station

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dog out to pee and as soon as she got to the screen door at the back of the house she became upset and actually tried to push her way out the screen door before i could open it. (she has never done this before). as soon as i opened the door and looked up i could see three orange glowing balls of light flying in a triangle formation. i screamed for my husband and son to come and see. as they were running to come and see a fourth orangle glowing ball flew in towards the three in formation but did not join them.  the formation continued flying north east and then stopped and hovered in formation. they remained there for about 20-30 seconds. the fourth single glowing ball of light kept travelling towards the triangle formation and then stopped and hovered beside the formation but did not join the formation.  they all just hovered there for an additional 10 seconds and then the triangle began moving north east again and then blinked out.  the remaining glowing orb kept moving north east and then blinked out about 10 seconds later.  there was no sound. it was a clear sky with a full moon. these objects did not move like planes or flares. we could see passenger planes flying at very high altitudes in the distance and the orbs were not at all interested in the planes.  they were flying much lower to the ground, maybe 200 or so feet above the ground.
content.summary: Glowing orange light balls flying in  triangle formation

content.detailedDescription:
In the south side of fort atkinson, wisconsin, at approximately 10:40pm on 8/10/2014 i opened our backyard sliding glass door to allow our dogs out before bedtime. i looked north to the skyline above the wooded area behind our home and observed a red tinged circular object that appeared to be moving and interacting with a white circular star-like object that did not move. the reason they stuck out was because there were high clouds that night and a very bright super moon from the sse and i couldn't make out any other stars in the sky.

when i noticed the objects moving i didn't take my eyes off of it the red tinged object was moving to and fro towards the star-like object and at this point the star-like object disappeared. i walked backwards and knocked on the door to have my wife witness this. she came out and confirmed what i was seeing. not being the type of person to typically care about such things, i was surprised to see her also struck by what was occurring in the sky. she suggested i run and get my astronomical binoculars and she would keep her eyes on the object. upon returning i could see that the red object had risen significantly into the sky and appeared large enough to discern white in addition to the red light.

upon viewing the object with the binoculars i could see red and white lights in a row. i stabilized the binoculars on the top of a chair and i could clearly see red and white lights in a row around the middle of the object, perhaps 5 or 6, one after the other. at this point the object was moving quite rapidly left to right and then up and down and in just a few seconds it moved rapidly rising the right and became smaller indicating it was moving away until we couldn't make it out with our eyes, but i could still see it with the binoculars.

when it appeared to be gone, we stood for for just moments for it to appear again to the left, just above the treeline of where it had faded just seconds before. it appeared to me to be larger and was moving more erratically almost trying to stay hidden in the treeline. at this point we could no longer see the object and continued to watch the sky for the next 10 minutes without seeing it again. i consciously thought during this time to take video or pictures with my camera phone, but did not and my only explanation is that i didn't want to interrupt what was occurring and i knew at our vantage point they would only look like muddled lights of little value.

my wife had stated that i was out of breath during most of the event as i traversed the backyard looking for the best view. i remember repeatedly reciting expletives in the excitement. my wife seemed quite taken with what she had seen which shocked me as unexplainable events rarely interest her. i proceeded to look out the blinds of our bedroom for the next hour to see if anything would come back. i had dream about the event that night and as i report this at work today it is heavy on my mind. truly a interesting event that we will not forget.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed lighted object interact with another object - fort atkinson, wi

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the yard area around my leased property and i saw a unusual looking white billowy cloud( storm cloud) so i found the colors to be interesting enough to take a photo. i took a photo but i didn't see anything else unusual about it. the photo stayed on my phone for a month or so, today i was clearing out photos to free up space on my cellular phone. i happened to open this one -to opt to keep it or delete it and i saw some unusual -odd shapes on the photo when i tapped it and expanded it. i was so shocked- i looked your website up and submitted it for review.

i did not see these orbs or things in the sky with my naked eye- or at time of this photo. these things in the sky were not what i was aiming to capture as i never noticed them at time of taking this picture. i only just noticed them right now aug 11 2014 at 10:30 am as i was fishing through my phone photos to free up space for new photos.

i do not give permission to share my home or mailing address,email address or phone number with any media sources. i do admit to this being my photo and it is real.
content.summary: Random photo of clouds and sky just past my home over a field

content.detailedDescription: When  i look ouside a hear a loud noise and i saw a circle with alot of lights the sound felt like a earthquake the ufo was very close to collide with my neighbor's house
content.summary: It was like 930 pm an i was on my bed then i hear a sound and turn on the light and i a giant circle

content.detailedDescription: Whe were outside and saw about 100 white discs that they moved in different directions all my neighborhood saw them
content.summary: I was outside with my brother mom and dad and i saw many white discs

content.detailedDescription: I took pictures of the river. when i looked through the pictures, i saw strange dark oval and round circles over the water. i think that this - a ufo.
content.summary: I took pictures of the river. when i looked through the pictures, i saw strange dark oval and round circles over the water. i think that this - a ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving to my friend's house.
2. bright red and white lights.
3. i thought it was a structure's lights, until it started moving and i stopped my car.
4. it was a wide/long v-shaped object with 2 lights at each point, 2 on the outer wings and one in the middle. each light was red with a smaller white light atop.
5. initially i thought it was a building, until it started moving. i observed the distance and realized just how gigantic it was, i tried to then take pictures with my cellphone after pulling the car over. i then followed it to get more pictures. was pretty excited, not scared or anything negative.
6. it went past a tree-line and i couldn't find a way past that.
content.summary: Huge v-shaped ufo over guelph line

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were having a cigarette at 11.45pm at back door, the sky was clear, stars were bright. i noticed coming from the west at approx. 70deg. 2 round glowing objects, the first smaller or higher than the 2nd. the 2nd was faster, larger and behind, on an intercept course coming from a wnw direction. the first object suddenly disappeared at approx. 80deg as the second object closed in on it, where upon, when the second object reached the point where the first disappeared, it also disappeared. we watched the path where both objects should have been if they did not disappear. no sign
there was no noise associated.
content.summary: 2 objects heading east, 2nd one on intercept course and faster 1st one dissapeared, 2nd dissapeared same place

content.detailedDescription:
I had let my dogs out into the back yard, and as i stepped out on the deck i noticed this bright orange light just above the fence, i wondered what star it was so i went back in the house to get my phone to look it up on my star map app. that's when i observed the object start to move. it headed north for about ten seconds or so and slowed to a stop. this immediately caught my attention cause it flew odd. i moved to the end of the deck to get a better look, to see if i could see any strobes or navigation lights, witch i could not. the object then without turning or banking reversed its direction to the south south east over the top of the san lorenzo library. it continued this path (past the house) then as it was just about over pasao padre it assumed a more easterly course. at this time i attempted to take a picture with my cell phone (at 10:44 and 36 seconds pacific standard time). after the camera flash the object was just gone. unfortunately the only image i got was an orange smudge. 5-10 minutes after the sighting 2 helicopters showed up in the approximately  same place i saw the object. one hovered there for a while and the other flew of to the south east along the 880 freeway. but seeing as hayward airport is just south of here that's not unusual. 
i am very familiar with aircraft. i'm a graduate of sierra academy of aeronautics. i had both my air-frame and power-plant licenses. i also live in the landing approach to the oakland airport. in sight of the oakland stadium. i can say unequivocally, it wasn't a plane, wasn't a helicopter, it wasn't a blimp. it wasn't a tilt rotor like the one that was landing in oakland last week. and satellites and meteorites don't change direction.
the experience was odd. i actually came in and talked about it on facebook. i've been unable to get to sleep and have looked out several times tonight but i haven't seen it. i'm just curious as to what it was, and if anyone else saw it. at least that way, my friends would know i'm not crazy.
content.summary: Steady glowing orange light

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i went out to the backyard to look at the supermoon and we saw 3 orange round lights round shape light over the 55 north freeway towards a lincoln avenue near tustin avenue & collins, we video taped them and we upload to youtube, they were hard to get on my cell phone but when we saw them, they were orange, they look like orange stars but they were closer to the ground or actually over the neighbors house, first 2 were side by side, then we saw a 3rd on bottom left & it accented towards the other 2, they they disappeared
content.summary: 3 orange balls

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my driveway.  the sun had just come out.  i heard a swishing noise and heard people (i thought) laughing and talking.  i saw a shinning object and it tanned my skin with redness.  i was looking to see what i could see.  i saw, what looked like a craft with 2 women and 1 man.  they did not look exactly human, but similar.  i waved at them, trying to get their attention.  i heard one woman say, "that woman can see us and she should not."  i stared for at least 5 minutes with them starring at me and me starring at them, kind of frozen in shock.  the craft disappeared in front of my eyes, but i could still hear them talking and the noise of the craft.  it became lower, the noise and they were gone.  i still think about it, and i have dreams about being abducted.  i wish i knew what it was.

the dreams i have are nightmares.  the aliens turn to human form to make me not be afraid.  they are interested in gene mutation of their race with ours.  i try not to think about it because there are no answers. 

this is a true account to the best of my knowledge.
content.summary: Observed ufo and beings

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the backyard with my dog and turned to the north and saw 5 or so bright red lights moving from the ground to the sky.  they hovered and then moved around in a 'w' pattern before they they just disappeared.  i ran onto the house and called my wife to come look outside in case they returned.  we both came back outside and the lights reappeared one by one.  they appeared to rise straight up from the ground and also to lower vertically to almost ground level as we both watched.  my wife ran inside and got my 22 year old son to come outside and watch as well.  the lights moved away from each other and towards each other. then separated and just disappeared one by one.  we saw planes during this occurrence and these did not behave like planes or helicopters.  we were very curious as to what this could be.  we have never seen anything in the sky behave like this. we even used our iphone to identify overhead planes in the sky. these were not planes.
content.summary: Five orange red lights moving vertically and horizontally viewed in the north sky

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch looking up at sky when i thought i saw a star but it was  moving erratically. i went to get my binoculars and a neighbor and i both watched as the object went in circles and made crazy,fast, squiggly movements and stopped then moved in strange directions. two others came out and also saw the white object which also flashed red and blue. i watched it for an hour. it was definitely not a star or plane because it was still then started bouncing around and wasn't going in a straight line. all of us were stunned.
content.summary: Saw white red and blue moving object in sky that jumped around in same general area

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south bound on fm 1378 approximately 9:00 pm. upon leaving my house i had noticed a thunderstorm far to the north with cloud to cloud lightening. while driving i saw a white flash. assuming it was lightening i looked over my shoulder to look at the storm cloud. to my immediate left i saw what i first believed to be an airplane or possibly a helicopter. there is a lot of air traffic in this area (dfw). when i first saw the "airplane" i noticed the green light, but it seemed unusually bright. the object was traveling in a north by northeast direction and appeared to be going in the direction of the storm. the object appeared to be flying erratically. at first i thought it was because i was in a moving vehicle so i pulled over and stopped. immediately after stopping the object appeared to stop. it hovered momentarily then the green light flashed white then turned red. i was then thinking that perhaps it was a helicopter and had made an abrupt turn, but the object dropped in altitude very abruptly then ascended just as rapidly in sort of a u shape. the object then moved in what i would call a cork screw or loop motion. the object then appeared to be moving ne once again but slowly dropped in altitude and out of my view. there was a large number of homes and trees between me and the object. it's hard to say how far away the object was because it's difficult to gage distance at night, but i'm guesstimating 1 to 1 1/2 miles.  i drove to thegg area where i believed the object descended to but i did not see it again. 

i've been around aircraft and have observed different types of aircraft my entire life, but this is the first time i've been unable to reasonably explain what i saw. this object moved like no aircraft i've ever seen.  i'm sure someone could explain this away but as of now i'm at a loss.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object traveling ne, erratic, stopped, dropped ascended in a u shape then descended from view

content.detailedDescription:
A regular skywatcher, familiar with aircraft shapes during the day, and many light configurations at night watching. living near the ct-ny border, i see lots of commercial air traffic from la guardia, newark, white plains, and many private places from danbury airport, which is near my home. as i was watching a boeing 757 late in the afternoon through my 7 x 50 binoculars, i saw an object hovering as the plane passed overhead (likely at altitude, between 27,000 and 33,000 feet is my guess).  at first, the object looked like a black piece of dirt on my lens.

after shaking the binoculars, i could tell the object was quite high up - likely 20,000 fee - up. at first it was difficult to keep the image framed (anyone familiar with optics knows that a small move in the viewing device makes a much larger change at the focal point).  the plane had passed, but i kept my eyes on the object, which hovered for a good 3 minutes or more.  as it did, it seemed to be rotating slowly, one side seemed to make it look like a black pyramid, but then it looked like a mylar balloon; then, as if the setting sun caught it, it glowed bright pink - copperish color (mostly maintaining a pyramid or diamond shape). then, as if turning another face towards me, it looked like a surface of silver mylar or tin foil. 

i wondered if it might be trash, or debris from an airliner, kept aloft by the thermals and the wind.  but it hovered at a fixed point in space, and after about 3 minutes, it started to move slowly laterally. i followed it for another minute or so, then a gnat flew into my eye, so i had to put my binocs down to wipe my eyes. when i looked up, it was impossible to see with the naked eye. i looked through the binocs for another 10 minutes to no avail - the object had either gone, or was so small and difficult to locate that i had to give up.

having witnessed a daytime orb previously, and having seen a lot of video of orb sightings, i would bet that's what i saw today.  since i have followed robert bingham "the ufo summoner", i have been trying to get sighting results using his summoning technique. to date, i have only had two successes: this april, 2014, and today (august 2014) - if indeed this was one of those 'morphing orbs'.  i mention this because it might be useful for other "skywatchers", to realize that it takes many, many hours of skywatching, and you can't always rely on the naked eye. try using a spyglass, telescope, or other ocular device, and give it 10 minutes in one area, then try another. and another.  you never know what you'll see!
content.summary: While plane spotting w/binoculars, noticed pink/copper object hovering at altitude
